attributes.action: make sure csa pay on time when monies are in account
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to make sure that the csa make the payments on time and not 2-3 months later,the way the csa are is appauling,they do not respond to phone calls ie; ring back they dont get your payments to you on time even if the money has been sent to them the service is appauling and the kids that go without for the sake of a bit of decent organisation
